page.title: 02EDUCATION
page.content: EDUCATION The state system of education in the area is 3 tier,infant,junior and senior.There is little state provision of nurseries but many playgroups run by voluntary helpers.Children are addmitted to school at 5 years of age,transfer to junior school at 7+ and then to secondary school at 11+.There is no selection examination and all secondary schools are comprehensive.There is a good choice of schools in the area as there are State schools,Anglican and Roman Catholic schools within reach of most children.Standards are high and many children go on to higher education.For further education young people travel outside the area.Bootle college of further education is able to offer a wide variety of courses.
